org.grails.plugin.vaadin.taglib
[Groovy] Class VaadinTagLib

java.lang.Object
  org.grails.plugin.vaadin.taglib.VaadinTagLib

class VaadinTagLib

Vaadin tags prefixed with "v", for example <v:label>

Tags provided:

  • layout
  • location
  • include
  • accordion
  • tabs
  • tab
  • horizontalLayout
  • verticalLayout
  • warning
  • error
  • table
  • column
  • form
  • field
  • checkBox
  • comboBox
  • date
  • listSelect
  • optionGroup
  • password
  • select
  • text
  • textArea
  • timeZoneSelect
  • localeSelect
  • currencySelect
  • file
  • customField
  • label
  • link
Also provided are helper methods for creating Components, intended to be called directly from GSP code rather than in a tag:
  • createAccordion
  • createInclude
  • createLayout
  • createLocation
  • createHorizontalLayout
  • createVerticalLayout
  • createTable
  • createTabs
  • createForm
  • createLabel
  • createLink
Finally, there are additional methods for special situations:
  • confirm
  • commit
Authors:
Francis McKenzie

Property Detail

accordion

groovy.lang.Closure accordion
Vaadin Accordion tag

Tabs to be added to the Accordion should be specified as nested <v:tab> elements.

checkBox

groovy.lang.Closure checkBox
CheckBox field

checkbox

groovy.lang.Closure checkbox
CheckBox field

column

groovy.lang.Closure column
Configuration tag for describing a column in a Vaadin Table

The column header should be specified as the body of the tag.

A column generator can be specified using the 'generator' attribute, which expects a Closure accepting an Item parameter. The item is the underlying data of a row in the table.

comboBox

groovy.lang.Closure comboBox
ComboBox field

commit

groovy.lang.Closure commit
Helper method that returns a closure that can be used in the 'onclick' attribute of a org.grails.plugin.vaadin.ui.RequestButton

Commits the specified form object.

attr:
form REQUIRED The form to commit

confirm

groovy.lang.Closure confirm
Helper method that returns a closure that can be used in the 'onclick' attribute of a org.grails.plugin.vaadin.ui.RequestButton

Used to trigger a confirm yes/no popup window, e.g. before deleting a domain object.

attr:
message REQUIRED The confirmation message

groovy.lang.Closure link
Custom org.grails.plugin.vaadin.ui.RequestButton tag

The button caption should be specified in the tag body.

attr:
icon The icon as a resource or path
attr:
onclick An closure expecting a 'dispatch' argument, used to manually trigger the link. Alternatively, simply return true from the closure to follow the link.

Constructor Detail

VaadinTagLib

Method Detail

applyAttrsAndBodyToComponent

protected com.vaadin.ui.Component applyAttrsAndBodyToComponent(java.lang.Object attrs, java.lang.Object body, java.lang.Object component, groovy.lang.Closure configurer = null, java.lang.String bodyProperty = null, java.lang.String configProperty = null)
Evaluates the tag body, which may return text and also may return configs from nested config tags.

If 'bodyProperty' is specified, the body text is added to the 'attrs' map with that as the key.

If 'configProperty' is specified, the configs are added to the 'attrs' map with that as the key.

Finally, the propertiesSetter Closure (or a default) is used to apply the 'attrs' map entries to the component.

Parameters:
attrs - The tag attributes to apply to the component
body - The tag body to evaluate, and add the results to the attrs map
bodyProperty - The key that will be used for storing the bodyText in the attrs map
configProperty - The key that will be used for storing the configs in the attrs map
configurer - The closure that will apply the resulting attrs map to the component
component - The component to which the attrs should be applied
Returns:
The same component, returned as a convenience

attachComponent

protected void attachComponent(com.vaadin.ui.Component component, java.util.Map attrs = null)
Attaches the component to the parent component in the current GspContext
Parameters:
component - The component to attach
attrs - Any additional attributes to pass to the attacher. E.g. may contain 'location'

attachConfig

protected void attachConfig(java.lang.Object attrs, java.lang.Object body, java.lang.Class componentClass, java.lang.String type, java.lang.Object bodyProperty = null)
Converts the tag attrs and body into a config object, and attaches this to the parent component in the current GspContext.

If 'bodyProperty' is specified, the body text is added to the 'attrs' map with that as the key.

Parameters:
attrs - The tag attributes to use for the config
body - The tag body to evaluate, and add the results to the attrs map
bodyProperty - The key that will be used for storing the bodyText in the attrs map
componentClass - The expected class of the parent component
type - The type name of this config

createConfirmPopup

protected java.lang.Object createConfirmPopup(com.vaadin.ui.Window window, java.lang.String prompt, groovy.lang.Closure onOK = null)
Creates a closure that can be used to open a popup window when a button is clicked.
arg:
prompt The prompt for the popup window
arg:
onOK The closure to run after the users clicks "OK"

fieldTag

protected void fieldTag(java.lang.Object attrs, java.lang.Object body)
Handles processing of all field-type tags.

lookupParentComponent

protected com.vaadin.ui.Component lookupParentComponent()
Finds the current Vaadin parent component.

removeAttachAttrs

protected java.util.Map removeAttachAttrs(java.util.Map attrs)
Removes entries from attrs map that are relevant to the attaching of the component to its parent, and should not be used to set properties on the component itself.

For example 'location' is only of interest to the parent component, as it specifies where in the parent component to attach this component.

Parameters:
attrs - The attrs map from which 'attaching'-type entries will be removed
Returns:
The map of 'attaching'-type entries that have been removed.

protected groovy.lang.Closure toClosure(java.lang.Object value)

toContainer

protected com.vaadin.data.Container toContainer(java.lang.Object value, java.lang.Object keys = null, java.lang.Object idProperty = null, java.lang.Object noSelection = null)
Converts the value to a Container.
Parameters:
value - If a collection, converted to a BeanContainer. Otherwise, the String representation is treated as a comma-separated list of values and converted to an IndexedContainer.
keys - List of keys to use for items in container, overriding both idProperty param, and the default id
idProperty - If is a closure, is called with bean as parameter to generate key. Otherwise, is treated as name of property of each bean that should be used as id.
noSelection - Caption to use for item that will represent a null selection. This will always be added as first item in list.

toCurrencies

protected java.util.List toCurrencies(java.lang.Object value)
Converts specified value to list of Currency objects

toCurrency

protected java.util.Currency toCurrency(java.lang.Object value)
Converts specified value to Currency

toDateResolution

protected int toDateResolution(java.lang.Object value)
Converts the value to a DateField Resolution

toFieldClass

protected java.lang.Class toFieldClass(java.lang.Object value)
Converts the value to a Field Class

Note that a list of aliases for Vaadin Component classes will be used for the conversion. E.g. a value of 'date' will translate to a DateField class.

toFieldDef

protected FieldDef toFieldDef(java.lang.Object props)
Converts the properties to a FieldDef

toFilteringMode

protected int toFilteringMode(java.lang.Object value)
Converts the value to a Vaadin Filtering Mode

toItemCaption

protected java.lang.String toItemCaption(com.vaadin.data.Item item, java.lang.Object value, java.lang.Object valueMessagePrefix)
Generates a caption for a single item using the optionValue and valueMessagePrefix params.
Parameters:
item - The item for which the caption will be generated
value - An item property name or closure that accepts the item (or wrapped bean) and returns the caption. If not specified, the item's toString() method is used to generate the caption
valueMessagePrefix - A value that will be prepended to the generated caption and the result is then used as an message code in a i18n lookup. If this returns null then the original generated caption is returned.
Returns:
The generated item caption

toItemIcon

protected com.vaadin.terminal.Resource toItemIcon(com.vaadin.data.Item item, java.lang.Object value)
Generates an icon for a single item using the value, which may be a property id or a closure that accepts the item (or wrapped bean) and returns the icon name
Parameters:
item - The item for which the icon will be generated
value - An item property name or closure that accepts the item (or wrapped bean) and returns the icon name.
Returns:
The resource for the generated icon name

toTimeZones

protected java.util.List toTimeZones(java.lang.Object value)
Converts specified value to list of TimeZone objects

toUploadFieldType

protected org.vaadin.easyuploads.UploadField$FieldType toUploadFieldType(java.lang.Object value)
Converts the value to an EasyUploads UploadField.FieldType

toUploadStorageMode

protected org.vaadin.easyuploads.UploadField$StorageMode toUploadStorageMode(java.lang.Object value)
Converts the value to an EasyUploads UploadField.StorageMode

toUploadSucceededListener

protected com.vaadin.ui.Upload$SucceededListener toUploadSucceededListener(java.lang.Object value)
Converts the value to a Upload.SucceededListener if not already.

toValueChangeListener

protected ValueChangeListener toValueChangeListener(java.lang.Object value)
Converts the value to a ValueChangeListener if not already.
